ProductInfo.Features:
4 Channel H.264 real time picture resolution industrial DVR, with 2000GB hard drive
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation. Four channel audio and video input
Support daylight saving time, PIP and EZOOM function, live video, parameter setting and copy playback video via network.
Support Remote view on iPhone, Google Phone. Real time Video code rate CIF: 200fps/4ch
Camera Feature: 480TVL, color CCD sensor, 3.6mm Lens, 20 IR LEDs
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Channel CCTV H.264 Real-Time 2000GB Network DVR Digital Video Recorder System with 4 Outdoor Day Night Infrared Dome Security Surveillance Cameras, 4 Pack Security Camera Extension Cables CDL
